subject: RE: [junit] [Q] Should TestDecorator/TestSetup extend from Test S	uite?
msgSnippet: ... Perhaps if there was a TestContainer interface, which TestSuite (and TestDecorator) could extend? Then it would be a matter of updating the TestRunners
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Johannes Link [mailto:john.link@...]
>
> > The reason I'm suggesting this is that the lovely Test
> Hierarchy panel in
> > the Swing Test Runner does not work properly if you have
> wrapped your test
> > suite inside of a Testsetup. It's fairly easy to fix (by
> re-implementing
> > TestSetup and extending it from TestSuite), but it's annoying.
>
> I'd rather like the TestRunner to be TestDecorator-aware. It
> could as easily
> show the wrapped Test-Instance.

Perhaps if there was a TestContainer interface, which TestSuite (and
TestDecorator) could extend? Then it would be a matter of updating the
TestRunners (and letting the third-party tools update themselves when they
get around to it)

Robert.
